result.title: Editorial — Cuộc chiến không khoan nhượng
result.content:
Problem A — IQ Test

This is a trivial problem, with 4x4 square you can use brute-force to solve this problem easily. Run over the row and column, check the condition on four cells in square.

In this problem, we found that user: quocnhan1843 had accepted after 8 submission. I think there are some problems with his Internet connection or his new operating system.

Problem B — Meeting

With small data input (1000 points and the value doesn't exceed 1000) you can use brute-force again! I see that some contestant used vector to store points for checking condition or iterate 4 edges of the rectangle. This is ok at all.

Test hack: Some of contestant got a wrong answer because check point at the corner twice.

Oh! Sorry, I must go now. So, I will write editorial for 3 last problems later. I'm very kind of you if you share your solution for this editorial. Share to be shared! Thanks
